title: MIST - Setup UI and Workflows in ServiceNow
description:
Description
For a customer
who wants to use our product
the capability
is a prerequisite
that contains all the efforts to setup the UI and workflow elements in ServiceNow 
so that we have a reliable connection between Juniper MIST UI Elements and workflows as well as ServiceNow
  Business Hypothesis:
Customer can order MIST functionalities in ServiceNow frontend, we are able to sell more + increase in revenue
acceptance_criteria: Created purchase order requisition for MIST
